title: 'Basic Income' in less than one minute

json.text: 'Basic Income' is an incredible idea that is spreading on social media like wildfire.
It is basically the idea that everyone should get some free money from Government for basic
needs like food and shelter. We are facing unprecedented levels of technological
unemployment that is increasing exponentially and many experts believe this form of wealth
distribution is really the future making the Welfare State much more efficient and making
people happy. Please help us end poverty and spread the word about 'Basic Income'
